text: The Servant Girl's Legacy is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Mabel Paige and "Babe" Hardy. Produced by Lubin Manufacturing Company, this short is the earliest surviving film performance of the legendary comedian Oliver Hardy.Louvish, Simon. "Babe: All Broken Out with the Movies", Stan and Ollie, the Roots of Comedy: The Double Life of Laurel and Hardy.
